company.name: Ghareeb Fencing Solutions
company.mission: To provide Northwest Ohio and Southeast Michigan with superior fencing solutions that combine exceptional craftsmanship, quality materials, and outstanding customer service at competitive prices.
company.vision: To be the most trusted and respected fencing company in the region, known for our integrity, quality, and commitment to customer satisfaction.

values.title: Quality Craftsmanship
values.description: We take pride in every fence we build, using premium materials and expert installation techniques that stand the test of time.

values.title: Customer First
values.description: Your satisfaction is our top priority. We listen to your needs, provide honest recommendations, and deliver results that exceed expectations.

values.title: Integrity
values.description: We conduct business with transparency and honesty. No hidden fees, no surprisesâ€”just straightforward pricing and reliable service.

values.title: Community

history.headline: Over a Decade of Fencing Excellence
history.summary: What started as a small family operation in Toledo has grown into one of the region's most trusted fencing companies, with thousands of satisfied customers across Northwest Ohio and Southeast Michigan.

timeline.title: Company Founded
timeline.description: Ghareeb Fencing Solutions was founded in Toledo, Ohio with a commitment to quality craftsmanship and customer service.

timeline.title: Expanded Service Area
timeline.description: Due to growing demand, we expanded our service area to include all of Lucas and Wood counties.

timeline.title: 100th Commercial Project
timeline.description: Completed our 100th commercial fencing project, solidifying our reputation in the business community.

timeline.title: Michigan Expansion
timeline.description: Extended services into Southeast Michigan, including Monroe County and surrounding areas.

timeline.title: Digital Innovation
timeline.description: Launched our online ballpark quote tool and virtual consultation services to better serve customers during challenging times.

timeline.title: 10 Year Anniversary
timeline.description: Celebrated 10 years in business with over 3,000 fencing projects completed and a 4.9-star customer rating.

timeline.title: Continued Growth
timeline.description: Added new team members and equipment to meet increasing demand while maintaining our commitment to quality.

team.headline: Meet the Team
team.description: Our experienced team brings decades of combined experience in fencing installation, customer service, and project management.

members.name: John Ghareeb
members.bio: With over 15 years of experience in the fencing industry, John founded Ghareeb Fencing Solutions with a vision of providing superior quality at fair prices. He personally oversees every estimate and major project.

members.name: Installation Team
members.bio: Our skilled installation crews have an average of 8+ years of fencing experience. Each team member is trained in proper installation techniques for all fence types and materials.

members.name: Customer Service
members.bio: Our friendly office team is here to answer your questions, schedule appointments, and ensure your project runs smoothly from start to finish.

certifications.name: Licensed & Insured
certifications.description: Fully licensed contractor with comprehensive liability and workers' compensation insurance.

certifications.name: BBB Accredited
certifications.description: Proud A+ rated member of the Better Business Bureau.

certifications.name: Manufacturer Certified
certifications.description: Certified installer for leading fence manufacturers including ActiveYards, Bufftech, and Simtek.

whyChooseUs.title: Free On-Site Estimates
whyChooseUs.description: No obligation quotes with accurate measurements and personalized recommendations for your property.

whyChooseUs.title: Competitive Pricing
whyChooseUs.description: Quality fencing at fair prices. We'll match or beat any comparable written estimate.

whyChooseUs.title: Professional Installation
whyChooseUs.description: Expert crews using proper techniques and quality materials for lasting results.

whyChooseUs.title: Warranty Protection
whyChooseUs.description: Workmanship warranties on all installations plus manufacturer warranties on materials.

whyChooseUs.title: Permit Assistance
whyChooseUs.description: We handle permit research and can assist with the application process for your municipality.

whyChooseUs.title: Clean Job Sites
whyChooseUs.description: We treat your property with respect, cleaning up thoroughly after every project.
